clear-answers-dialog.description: This will delete all saved answers. This action cannot be undone.
clear-answers-dialog.title: Clear all answers?

-GLJeZ-L-K.clue: Find the biggest drink cup for sale and take a photo next to it.

-buCfuZ_Js.clue: You've got a postcard to mail. Where in the Central Terminal can you buy postage stamps?

answer.details:
The toppings are:

- Boba
- Popping boba
- Jelly
- Drizzles

1XWgzKECE6.clue: Find the boba shop. How many different toppings can you choose from?

answer.details: Gate D26 is located downstairs, across from Gate D5.

4B8BuOoy-A.clue: Head downstairs and away from the crowds. What's the highest D gate number you see?

6IjATuH8h-.clue: Take a photo of a plane passing underneath the international arrivals skybridge.

96FePKs7zD.clue: Take a selfie with Jett the SEA otter.

Ajg7X3_CWe.clue: Take a selfie with a SEA pup.
Ajg7X3_CWe.hint: [SEA pups](https://www.portseattle.org/page/sea-pups) are usually at the airport from 10:00am - 12:00pm at the central terminal.

BL5xfCD1Pl.clue: Take photos of three different aircraft tails for non-US carriers.

CEDiAt5_TD.clue: Take a selfie with a gate sign for a flight heading outside of the United States.

answer.details: "[cloudsandclunkers](https://www.portseattle.org/page/cloudsandclunkers-peter-shelton)" by Peter Shelton hangs above Concourse A near Seattle Beer Union.

FwkTyDghkR.clue: Look up near Seattle Beer Union. How many cloud sculptures are floating above you?

answer.details: If planes are taking off from right to left, the airport is in south flow. If planes are taking off from left to right, the airport is in north flow.

GpyOC1fxZv.clue: Watch a few planes take off. Based on the takeoff direction, what flow is the airport in today?
GpyOC1fxZv.hint: Airport flow is the direction airplanes take off toward. For example, if planes take off toward the south, the airport is in south flow.

answer.details: There are 13 balls in the north section of the sculpture, and one ball in the south section.

JTaK-wv-cm.clue: Find "On: Matter, monkeys and the king" by Trimpin. How many balls are in the sculpture?

answer.details: The vending machines near the escalators in the South Satellite sell a variety of Japanese food and drinks.

JjwwVsnaNJ.clue: Take a photo of a Japanese sandwich.

answer.details: Gate B21 is accessed using the escalator or elevator at the end of Concourse B, near Gate B15.

KFNxBoixx9.clue: Past Gate B15, there's an escalator to a tucked-away gate area. What's the highest-numbered B gate there?

KGJ0DPoG4R.alternateText: Crop of a photo of a painting, showing a slice of red velvet cake in a gold picture frame.
KGJ0DPoG4R.clue: What animal is eating this slice of cake?

MSjgrbHme1.clue: Find someone wearing Buc-ee's clothing and take a photo of the logo.

Mr8NTBLVuw.clue: Visit the all-gender restroom. How many faucets are at the sink?

PWYzT5xEM_.clue: Take a ride on the SEA underground. What are the three colors of the different train lines?

answer.answer: On the back wall of Koi Shi Sushi.

Sd9BH5N5gY.clue: Where is this tile pattern located?

answer.details: "[Modern Mask](https://www.portseattle.org/page/modern-mask)" by James Schoppert is a 3' tall painted wood sculpture.

ShfXCzAYKC.clue: Find the painted wood sculpture "Modern Mask." How many faces stare back at you?

U2Ml_N2Ao1.clue: Take a photo of an album cover with the letter S on it.

answer.details: It takes nine minutes to walk, and 11 minutes to take the train. The times are shown at the bottom of the map on the information display on the landing between A gates and the train station.

VGDb3ekZZs.clue: Check the travel time display between Concourse A and the train station. Is it faster to walk or take the train to C gates?

VcADSD4gkY.clue: Josie works at the Fireworks store. What is Josie's favorite sports team?

W8xP5ZKtnC.alternateText: Photo of eight airplane tails with Chester's face.
W8xP5ZKtnC.clue: Chester is the name of the face on the tail of Alaska Airlines airplanes. Look out the window at gate D5. How many Chester faces can you see?

WOflQcqqRa.clue: Listen to SEA Tower and take a photo of a plane you heard cleared for takeoff.

answer.answer: Three fish are carrying suitcases, and eight planes have fins.
answer.details:
The fish are located:

- Across from Gate B3
- At the bottom of the ramp near the nursing pod
- At the top of the B train station escalators.

The planes are located:

- Near Gate B3 (three planes)
- Near Gate B6
- Near Gate B7/B7A
- Near the seats at the bottom of the ramp (three planes)

XU2Q6uk5Sj.clue: Find "Flying Fish" by Judith and Daniel Caldwell. How many fish are carrying suitcases? How many airplanes have fins?

answer.details:
The languages are:

- Arabic
- Chinese
- English
- Japanese
- Korean
- Russian
- Spanish
- Vietnamese

Y7qiTGjFDA.clue: Ride the blue train to the South Satellite. How many languages are shown on the "Please hold on" digital sign?

Z8uD5RIdFk.clue: Explore the shops. Take a photo of the single most expensive item you can find for sale.

a8vW4xzkkW.clue: Find the water bottle filler with the highest number of bottles saved, and take a photo of the bottle count.

cvI9vHSRuC.clue: Take a selfie with an automated defibrillator.

ewJw9uhuxK.clue: Take a selfie with a live plant.

answer.answer: Cordell works at the Luck Shines shoe shine near gate D2.

fId26KufqS.clue: Where does Cordell "The Transformer" Truluck work?

glwn2opFlc.clue: Which restaurant serves a dish called deconstructed hash?

jdadKFgQo7.clue: Find OSCARsort and ask it to help you sort something into the correct bin.

mdihls1FXP.clue: Find a gate with a flight to a city inside Washington State and take a selfie with the sign.

answer.details: The dog is located at Hachi-Ko.

nGRX7LLH2E.clue: Take a selfie with the neon dog.

answer.answer: At the entrance to the restrooms by Poke to The Max.

nOMs1a7gGN.clue: Where is this tile pattern located?

ndC0lIJES6.clue: Take a photo of a hibiscus flower.

answer.details:
The lounges are:

* Delta (A11)
* Delta One (A11)
* The Club (A11)
* United (A10)
* Delta (A1)
* American Express Centurion (Central Terminal)
* Alaska (C16)
* Alaska (D1)
* Alaska (mezzanine above N13-N18)
* The Club (above S10)
* British Airways (above S10).

pB53_yVOPQ.clue: Take a selfie outside the entrance of each airport lounge.
pB53_yVOPQ.hint: There are eleven lounges at SEA, with ten entrances.

qsWmZtJQx9.clue: Search the gate screens and snap a photo of the highest flight number you spot.

qtcTszICZ5.clue: Ride the yellow line train. How many fire extinguishers are mounted to the wall in the tunnel?
qtcTszICZ5.hint: Count only extinguishers mounted to the tunnel wall; the one on the train does not count.

sZLbWTNUXK.clue: Take a photo of a sign written in a language other than English.

tYEDPlu30G.clue: Which airlines grant business class passengers access to both The Club and British Airways Terraces lounges?

uaPC_HvMqd.clue: Take a photo of something with the Space Needle on it.

answer.details:
The information desks are:

- A info: across from Swarovski in Concourse A
- A3 info: across from Starbucks by Gate A3
- Checkpoint 1: inside Checkpoint 1 on the landing between Concourse A and the A train station
- A train: in the A train station
- Central info: in the central terminal near Dilettante Chocolates & Mocha Cafe
- D info: Across from the all-gender restrooms in Concourse D
- D train: in the D train station
- N info: in the North Satellite

uzxCpAxD0O.clue: Take a selfie at every information desk.
uzxCpAxD0O.hint: There are eight information desks post-security.

v86d2mm7UT.clue: Check the gate signs around the airport. How many gates have a letter after the number?

vV3adEqeuE.clue: Where can you get avocado toast for breakfast?

vVonLvfgvX.clue: Take a selfie with a vending machine selling something other than food and drink.

answer.answer: At the Washington Lotto desk near gate C10.

vVzEujhDHt.clue: If you hit the jackpot, where in Concourse C would you cash your Washington Lotto ticket?

wIuAhUYSUJ.clue: Find the CBP office in Concourse A. What's the phone number posted outside?

answer.details: "[Journey Home](https://www.portseattle.org/page/journey-home-larry-kirkland)" by Larry Kirkland is a 32' long boat made out of aluminum and glass. The shadow is made from approximately seventy bronze elements.

xH4xrNHYJe.clue: Find the shadow in the terrazzo floor. What object casts the shadow?

answer.details: Airport volunteers are ambassadors for both the airport and the Puget Sound region. [Learn more](https://www.portseattle.org/Volunteer) about the program.

xNr6O90eQa.clue: Listen to the airport announcements. What is the name of the volunteer?

yTNP29jtdB.clue: Head upstairs to the mezzanine in the North Satellite. Which restaurant is there?

answer.details: The art is hanging on the wall outside the all-gender restrooms.

post-security-page.introduction1: Welcome to SEA! This scavenger hunt helps you explore the entire airport. How many items can you find?
post-security-page.introduction2: All answers and items can be found in public spaces. There is no need to go through any doors, and don't accidentally exit to the pre-security side of the airport when hunting for items!
post-security-page.introduction3: Your answers are stored locally in your browser and are never sent to a server.
post-security-page.title: SEA scavenger hunt
